attributes.action: Stop the closure of Belmont & Gilesgate schools in Durham, we don't want the proposed academy!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please stop the proposed academy school that Durham County Council want to build in our area. Two great schools will close for something that is not wanted!!! Please sign this petition to SAVE OUR SCHOOLS.....No one wants the proposed academy...say NO to the academy & Durham County Council....NOW....
